Edmond institutional research data repository
 
Edmond, the institutional Open Research Data Repository of the Max Planck Society, provides Max Planck researchers and (upon invitation) their external collaborators with a home to publish/share their data from all scientific disciplines.
 
Data collections can be described with general metadata and directly linked to corresponding scientific publications. Further user-defined metadata profiles are possible. Technical metadata (file properties, e.g. details for image files) for individual items (files) are automatically extracted.
 
The data limit of nominally/initially 10GB can be increased upon request, simply contact us. The size of individual files should not exceed 5GB. DOI assignment turns published collections into citable research objects. All data are stored within the Max Planck Society, and backed up regularly.
